casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

November, 1947.

(November 12, 1947.) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. Leo J. Mleczko, Appellant.

Judgment of conviction affirmed. All concur; Dowling, J., not voting. (The judgment convicts defendant of the crime of murder, first degree, with a recommendation for life imprisonment.) Present — Dowling, Harris, McCurn, Larkin and Love, JJ.
